title: Ekko arguments don't make sense.
body: Last time I saw a thread about ekko saying that it's not "healthy" for him to be able to build different things? What? A champion is supposed to only have 1-2 builds? So what if he builds triforce? It's not like he's one shotting your adc late game. He's so garbage when the adc has common sense or a qss. TANK EKKO WILL NOT ONE SHOT YOUR ADC. The reason he builds triforce is so he doesn't need to buy both a lich bane and nashors to make his w relevant

replies.body: Tank ekko will oneshot your ADC, just slightly more slowly.

the problem is people will get destroyed by ekko in one game then go on the boards and cry about it. Then the next guy see's it, and the next time he plays against an ekko and get destroyed he thinks "yeah those guys on the boards were right, ekko op" then they go and start their own little thread, And round and round we go.

Tank Ekko has a worse winrate than AP Ekko yet people talk about how Ekko should build tank. Tank Ekko is garbage now, his damage is hella low. Ekko is general is bad but Triforce Ekko is another level of uselessness.
He **will** one shot your adc while having 4k health. If you haven't fought one then you don't know. His ult just makes him even more of a tank.
Always nice to see unranked people making bronze insults.
